desc: Zug Jug is a high end stainless steel double wall insulated jug loaded with features other jugs don't offer. The nutrition container, or Zuggie, connects directly to the Zug Zug and keeps food hot for long periods of time. Now you can have your hydration and nutrition in one simple, high-end container.

layout.text: Zug Jug: The World's Greatest Jugs
72 oz. super-insulated enhanced jug with optional screw-on food container.
